title: Patient Name
instruction: Extract the patient’s full name exactly as it appears in the transcript. Only include the name if it is explicitly mentioned. Do NOT guess or infer the patient’s name from context, doctor names, or other people mentioned. If the patient’s name is not present in the transcript, return "-". Never return doctor names, staff names, family member names, or any other proper nouns that are not the patient. Return only a single string containing the patient name or "-" if unknown.
